data.title: Prescott, Arizona Population 2024
data.text:
Prescott is a city located in Yavapai County Arizona. Prescott has a 2024 population of 48,324. It is also the county seat of Yavapai County. Prescott is currently growing at a rate of 1.19% annually and its population has increased by 4.92% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 46,056 in 2020.

The average household income in Prescott is $96,801 with a poverty rate of 11.34% . The median age in Prescott is 60.5 years: 59.8 years for males, and 61.3 years for females.

Prescott Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Prescott was:

White : 89.21%

Two or more races : 4.25%

Other race : 3.23%

Asian : 1.9%

Native American : 0.64%

Black or African American : 0.62%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0.15%
